Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the necessary components for running the game.

    • Method Detail

      • loadMap

        public void loadMap​(java.lang.String filename)
             throws InvalidMapException
        Loads and reads the map line by line, instantiates and initializes Map m. Print out the number of rows, then number of cols (on two separate lines).
        Parameters:
        filename - the map text filename
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException

      • isWin

        public boolean isWin()
        Can be done using functional concepts.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the win condition has been satisfied

      • isDeadlocked

        public boolean isDeadlocked()
        When no crates can be moved but the game is not won, then deadlock has occurred.
        Returns:
        Whether deadlock has occurred

      • display

        public void display()
        Print the map to console

      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove​(char c)
        Parameters:
        c - The char corresponding to a move from the user w: up a: left s: down d: right r: reload map (resets any progress made so far)
        Returns:
        Whether or not the move was successful
